CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(APXTConga4__Sample_Record_Id__c = "", APXTConga4__Button_Link_API_Name__c = ""), IMAGE( "/resource/APXTConga4__DisabledLaunchButton" , "Launch Composer"),
HYPERLINK("https://" & MID( $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_320, FIND("://", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_100)+3, FIND( ".com", $Api.Enterprise_Server_URL_100 )-4) & "servlet/servlet.Integration?lid=" & APXTConga4__Weblink_Id__c & "&eid=" & APXTConga4__Sample_Record_Id__c & "&ic=1" , IMAGE( "/resource/APXTConga4__ComposerLaunchButton" , "Launch Composer"), "_blank" ) )
CustomField.label: Launch
